text:
When a project is opened and afterwards you save the testplan and exits JMeter, 
this recent project doesn't show when starting JMeter again. Should be shown in 
file as a 'recent opened project' OR the recent folder should be shown in File-
Open.
creator: r.vanderboom@kpn-is.nl
sebb@apache.org
text:
This would be a useful enhancement - I think there might be another Bugzilla
entry about it; can't find it at present.

The file menu bar now displays the four most recently loaded files. Fixed in SVN
576553.
creator: alf@i100.no
